name: Customer Lifetime Value Prediction - Developer View
description: This app enables users to train and predict customer lifetime value for any customer, given the feature set.

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Customer Lifetime Value Predictive Analytical App

Overview

The Customer Lifetime Value (CLV) Predictive Analytical App helps retail and E-commerce businesses increase customer retention and maximize revenue. It does this by designing personalized promotional offers based on CLV predictions. The model segments customers using Recency, Frequency, and Monetary (RFM) value, which enables targeted marketing strategies to encourage repeat purchases, optimize marketing spend, and improve profitability by identifying high-value customers and designing retention strategies for low-value customers.

Input

  • + Data collection from transactional records including purchase frequency, transaction value, and recency to segment customers.
  • + Train a machine learning model using customer-level features such as recency, frequency, monetary value, total spend, average days between purchases, and cancellations.
  • + Train a KMeans clustering model to segment customers into behavioral clusters based on interaction history.
  • + Perform exploratory data analysis to clean and inspect data, identify missing values, and explore transaction patterns over time and geography.

Output

  • + CLV predictions for individual customers using the trained model.
  • + Core customer segments identified by purchase behavior and visit frequency.
  • + Cluster predictions to build a behaviorally segmented customer base.
  • + Clear differentiation between high-value and low-value customer groups.
  • + Weekly and monthly sales trends and store purchasing patterns.
  • + Most-engaged and least-engaged store segments.
  • + Hidden characteristics by revenue group and product popularity.
  • + Visualizations of daily invoices, monthly invoices, customer transaction densities, visit frequencies, and repeat purchase intervals.
  • + Clean and insight-rich data enabling effective segmentation and prediction.
  • + Saved KMeans model and cluster centroids with segment-level averages.

Benefits

  • + Increased Customer Retention and Revenue: Personalize offers to drive repeat purchases and long-term value.
  • + Optimized Marketing Spend and Profitability: Allocate resources more effectively by targeting high and low-value customers differently.
  • + Deeper Customer Understanding: Gain insight into behavior patterns, engagement levels, and geographic spread.
  • + Actionable Segmentation: Segment customers behaviorally for targeted retention, upsell, or re-engagement strategies.
  • + Data-Driven Personalization: Use RFM and machine learning to create impactful promotional campaigns.
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html1", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "
", "refreshOnChange": false, "key": "html", "type": "htmlelement", "input": false, "tableView": false }, { "label": "Next", "action": "event", "showValidations": false, "theme": "info", "customClass": "mt-0 float-right rounded", "tableView": false, "key": "next", "type": "button", "event": "next", "input": true } ] }
